exceptions.tactic: apply g_app_inv in H as [L [R [HL [Hl Hr]]]].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (k i : nat) P (l r : list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))), g k i P = l ++ r -> exists L R : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = L ++ R /\\ l = g k i L /\\ r = g k (length l + i) R" on hypothesis of type "(j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P)".
The reference L was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

exceptions.tactic: apply g_subcode with (ρ := hd (mm_inc (Fin.of_nat_lt (lt_O_Sn n))) L).
exceptions.exn: The reference L was not found in the current environment.

original: intro H. apply g_app_inv in H as [L [R [HL [Hl Hr]]]]. exists (hd (mm_inc (Fin.of_nat_lt (lt_O_Sn n))) L). split. - apply g_subcode with (ρ := hd (mm_inc (Fin.of_nat_lt (lt_O_Sn n))) L). simpl in *. rewrite types_of_ini, HL, <- app_nil_l. apply sc_prefix. - subst l. rewrite Hl. apply nth_error_app1. now rewrite <- length_g with (i := i). apply nth_error_split in Hg as [left [right HH]]. now rewrite HH in Hg.
